heading: Season of Belial Week 1 Tier List Updates
content: Season 8: Belial's Return is live for a week now! As usual, we've done a complete overhaul of our tier lists. Take a look at our new and updated tier lists to get an idea of how your build stacks up for leveling, endgame, and speedfarming in the upcoming season! Are you ready ? We included in our Tier Lists specific setups using the Season 8 power Note that these setups are variants in the Build Guide itself and we will be adding more in the next days! Check out now our Season of Belial Tier List Updates! On top of Season 8 Tier List Updates, our team is hard at work polishing and updating the build guides for Season 8: Belial's Return. Keep an eye out for new and updated resources in the next days days! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 8 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
